review: Great device, easy to install and easy to use. There are only two minor issues: too few apps supporting it (basically youtube and netflix so far) and sometimes it's keeps playing videos after you try to stop them on your phone or laptop.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Not as nice as a Roku or Apple TV.  Relies on an eternal device to stream to the Chromecast.  I prefer the Apple TV or Roku because only a wifi connection is needed.  Netflix,Hulu, MLB etc all run within the device.  They also have their own remotes in addition to smart phone apps.  Chromecast you need an Android device or your computer to control it.  No physical remote and no Iphone or Windows Phone app.
author: David Shute

review: A device with great potential held back with the lack of supported applications and services.  There are currently only six supported applications so there's not much variety you can use or do if you use multiple and different services.

review: I love the Chromecast! I watch Netflix all the time through it. My only complaint is I wish they had more applications supported but I hear its coming soon.
